name: svgSanitizer
description: A MODX extra for parsing SVG files inline. The file is cleaned first, to make sure there's no malicious javascripts or external links inside. Uses the following sanitizer: https://github.com/darylldoyle/svg-sanitizer/
author: Hugo Peek

snippets.name: svgSanitize
snippets.description: This snippet cleans a single SVG file and returns the output inline.
